full of youthful vigor (idiom)/in the prime of youth

sentences.english: Theyre just a couple of hotheaded teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 他们只是一对年少气盛的小伙子。

sentences.english: The experience of our side and the youthful determination of the other balance each other out.
sentences.chinese: 我方经验丰富，对方年轻气盛决心大，两者不相上下。

sentences.english: I don't blame the young guys for trying to make a splash.
sentences.chinese: 我不指责那些年轻气盛想要引起轰动的人。
